segments.name: processingDistrictPortCode
segments.description: The code for the U.S. port where the enclosed transaction(s) are to be ‘processed’.

segments.name: filerCode
segments.description: Filer’s identification code (as assigned by CBP).

segments.name: applicationIdentifierCode
segments.description: A code that identifies the type of transaction data within the block.

segments.name: processingFilerOfficeCode
segments.description:
A code agreed upon by the Filer and CBP representing a specific Filer ‘office’ (or sub-location).

Space fill if not used.

segments.name: remotePreparerDistrictPortCode
segments.description:
The code for the U.S. port location of the Remote Preparer.

Space fill if not a remotely prepared block.

segments.name: remotePreparerFilerCode
segments.description:
Remote Filer’s (Preparer) identification code (as assigned by CBP).

Space fill if not a remotely prepared block.

segments.name: remotePreparerOfficeCode
segments.description:
A code agreed upon by the Remote Preparer and CBP representing a specific Preparer ‘office’ (or sub-location).

Space fill if not used or not a remotely prepared block.

segments.name: remotelyFiledIndicator
segments.description:
An indication that the block has been prepared and filed remotely in accordance with the Broker District permit rules as set forth in CBP regulation.

1 = Remote Entry Submission.

Space fill if not used or not a remote submission.

segments.name: filerPreparerSUserDataText
segments.description:
Provided for the Filer/Preparer’s internal use. These positions are returned, unmodified, in the B-Record returned in the response to the block.

Space fill if not used.
